windows.name: windows.info.Info
windows.description: Displays basic information about the memory image.

windows.name: windows.pstree.PsTree
windows.description: Shows a hierarchical process list (tree) similar to pstree on UNIX.

windows.name: windows.iat.IAT
windows.description: Lists the Import Address Table for processes.

windows.name: windows.pslist.PsList
windows.description: Lists active processes using the PsActiveProcessHead method.

windows.name: windows.dlllist.DllList
windows.description: Lists the loaded modules for each process.

windows.name: windows.cmdline.CmdLine
windows.description: Shows command line arguments for each process.

windows.name: windows.malfind.Malfind
windows.description: Detects and highlights potentially malicious code in memory.
